about_the_game:
We all have a lot to say about BUTTON.


But I'd argue I have way more to say. And I already said it.

Do you need to listen to Josh Powlison's BUTTON: Mildly Remastered Edition Developer Commentary Pack 001 on your walks? On your runs? On your drives? On your flights?

Then this is how. And it includes high-quality original assets, not just the compressed audio you get in the game.

I'm concerned that having this so disconnected from the experience of button-pressing may damage the experience. But it's a sacrifice I'm willing to make. For you.
